content.detailedDescription: I attended the play "spamalot" at shea's buffalo theatre, downtown buffalo, ny with my son(also observed the event), and 2 friends.  returned to the car parking lot after the play and, while my friend was attempting to back out of a tight parking space, i looked up at the night sky hoping to see the planet jupiter, prominent in the sky at that time.  the sky was somewhat hazy with sufficient light pollution that only the brightest objects were visible.  i spotted a bright star-like object that i at first suspected was jupiter, but later realized was the bright star arcturus in bootes.  shortly after that observation (facing east), i noticed a very small object to the right of arcturus moving left toward the star.  at first i suspected it to be a satellite or "space junk" that i have observed numerous times in the night sky at home in chautauqua county.  but on closer examination, despite the fairly poor seeing conditions, i realized that i could see textural and color details on the object.  i ascertained that it was perfectly round, red on the outer margins gradually grading to orange toward the center, where the color was a distinct white. as i was observing these details, i caught the appearance of second, identical orb, below and trailing behind the first one.  their apparent separation was equivalent to about a three inch separation of thumb and fore-finger on my outstretched arm.  they made no noise, and their speed was that of very fast satellite objects.  they eventually flew past arcturus and merged close together before both came to a full, dead stop.  it was then that my son and i realized that these were not ordinary satellites.  in fact, they were probably not satellites at all!  they maintained a constant distance at a dead stop for probably a bit less than 5 minutes, until the upper orb (#1) reversed course and flew back the way it had come.  shortly after, the 2nd orb also reversed course but before moving very far it performed an amazing rapid zig-zag dance -- at which point my son and i explained in unison "[expletive deleted]did you see that?!"  at this point it was clear that we were observing our first sighting of a genuine ufo, actually, two ufos.  we watched as they flew side-by-side in an apparently constant separation heading off in a westerly direction.  our observations were terminated by our friends who had succeeded in extracting their car and were anxious to head home to fredonia.  they never saw the two orbs, and have since regretted not stepping out of the car when we implored them to do so.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: First one, joined by a second reddish orb, converged, stopped, flew back in formation

content.detailedDescription:
Myself, my wife and many other people witnessed a large, mysterious black ring in the sky above anaheim ca on 5/20/15. it resembled thick black smoke and seemed to be spinning. 

it hovered and drifted in the sky for approximately 2 minutes until it disintegrated.

i happened to see people pointing and noticed it in what i think was the southeastern sky.Its shape and behavior don't match any known aircraft to me either. definitely very strange!
content.summary: Mysterious black ring in the sky above anaheim ca

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on east patio saw contrail traveling from n to s in very straight line. about 10:35am 5-21-15. also saw normal commercial traffic coming from e at same time.  object was two-three of my outstretched fists above e horizon.  w/binoculars, object difficult to determine but i am assuming aircraft but leading portion looked reddish/very. what was odd was seeing color, and a n/s track. planes in this area are e/w or vary the flight path.
content.summary: Possible high alt fast moving aircraft n/s straight path left contrail unable to focus w/binoculars.  higher alt than reg aircraft.    n

content.detailedDescription:
I was shooting a video of my kid at the local beach, didn't see or hear anything, got home uploaded the video, seen what i thought may have been a bug or bird? thought it was just a bit odd looking so i loaded the video into my computer movie maker to slow it down. then i seen for sure it was not a bug or bird and it was reflecting the setting sun. i zoomed in and the best i can tell it is pill-shaped and reflecting sunlight like something metallic would do. no wings like a bird or a bug. very fast. makes me wonder what else i don't see with my naked eye? was using a gopro in an underwater housing. the lens is slightly curved like a fish-eye so maybe the slight directional path of the object could be due to the lens configuration?
here in this end of the dominican republic there is very little air-traffic so when an airplane or helicopter does fly by everyone is looking. its a rare event so i would surely have noticed any airplane noise but i didn't.
content.summary: Just seen my video had some strange anomally

content.detailedDescription: Today 21/05/2015 around 11am i was standing outside the back of our offices observing the birds making nests in a tree just outside of our property, i took a photo hoping i could zoom in as i wanted to see how many birds have made a nest in the tree, after view my photo and zooming to take a closer look i noticed a weird looking object in my photos, seconds after i had taken the photo i viewed it, then immediately looked up into the sky into the direction the object would have been but it was already gone, i have also tried to reinact the situation to try and figure out what it might be but nothing, its a very clear day with no wind, no clouds, no airplanes in our area, the object was definitely quite a distance as i zoomed in to take a closer look it starts to pixalate and if the object was pretty close you'd be able to view the object properly. i have circled the object in red on the left and the one on the right is a bird to compare the different sizes. i would like to know what the object is please and if you can assist in this regard i would greatly appreciate it, please advise what this object might have been. thank you
content.summary: I was taking a photo of a tree behind our offices when i saw the object captured in my photo

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home.(coker,al) from walmart (north port,al) and noticed something that appeared to be falling fast from the sky in what i thought was fragments of something. i seen 4 distinct trails. the lead one was  bright,reflective,white . from looking at the trails it looked as though one may of changed course during its decent. my initial feeling was fear. i didn't know if i witnessed some kind of aircraft that may of exploded,an asteroid, or missles. i honestly do not know what it was i witnessed. when i pulled in my driveway i ran inside and got my family to come look. we could still see the (smoke trails), but no longer could see the aircraft. the whole event lasted less than 5 minutes. i am submitting photos of the encounter. some photos are originals (just cropped) and the other are from where i adjusted shadows and highlights to see it better.
content.summary: I seen something coming down from the sky and my 1st thought ot was an asteroid breaking up or an airplane crashing.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my best friend went outside  because i needed to smoke a cigarette. we started to walk out to the street and that is when we looked up at the night sky to observe the stars. it was beautiful that night, so calm and awkwardly quite. that's when we noticed a strange looking what we thought was, a star at the time until the object then moved. we looked around the sky for another star like moving object that is when we saw what we thought were two plains just above the tree line but they didn't move through the sky like planes would no, the seemed to more hover and go in a pattern like stream. we looked at one another in amazement then looked back at the night sky. we in the house after it was midnight that's then when our curiosity got the best of us. so we went back outside to the street but this time i brought my iphone with us to snap these great pictures. we couldn't believe what we had just witnessed and we couldn't really talk about it either. during this event everything was quite like, there was no background noise. no crickets chirping, no vehicle's, nobody outside and, no animals. the street light even seemed like it was more dimmer then usual. after the event the crickets were chirping, my house cats came out, the street light was back to normal and there were the usual voices across the way.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I just went outside to smkoke a ciggarette!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down a gravel country road.  i saw a large object in the sky and immediately thought it was a jumbo jet crashing.  that thought lasted as long as it took to have it.  a second.  it was a very large object close to the ground.  i sped up and reached the top of the hill and could clearly see the object.  i proceeded to drive to the end of the road and pull over.  i was approximately 400 feet away.  i proceeded to get out of my car and noticed that as i stepped onto the gravel road the sound was amplified.  i then paid attention that there was no sound of rustling grass or sounds of birds or animals that i was familiar with in the area.  it felt like i could only hear what was happening within my bubble of a few feet.  i threw a rock and didn't here it land several feet away.  but i heard my breathing and the sound of my feet and clothing very loudly.  also the sound of my own voice seemed much louder.  i noticed a metal taste in the air... a strange way to smell the air, by taste.  as for the sound.  only a strange hum.  but i place that with the strange sound bubble i seemed to be in.  as for the craft it was a dull silver colored metal.  there seemed to be something running down the center of the item.  there seemed to be almost a seam.  possible view port.  there appeared to be a pattern on the metal.  but i wasn't close enough to see detail.  i got in and out of my car several times paying attention to the sounds and smells.  my two young children were in the back seat asleep so i rolled the window down to ensure i couldn't be locked out.  i wouldn't go more than 5 feet from the car because of the children.   i wanted to walk out into the field to get closer.  i had a strange  euphoric feeling.  i was excited and happy and calm.  this surprised me after that i wasn't afraid.  i also had this strong sense that someone was watching me aware i was watching them.  hard to explain.  this was a full daylight sighting.  after watching for about 8 minutes the craft started to move.  there was a lumbering metal bending noise and the sound around me returned to normal. i got back into my car and started it.  the craft was slowly moving north (my left).  i turned left onto hwy 7.  the craft lumbered overhead of me until i was directly beneath it.  it cast a shadow.  it was definately disc shaped.  there appeared to be a circular piece on the underside that appeared like it could open.  this appeared to be closing as it was directly overhead.  then the craft began to accelerate and gain altitude slowly at first then gained speed  suddenly.  from the onset on acceleration to the point the craft "zipped" off was only a couple seconds.  then after it was a quarter mile fom me it was instantly shooting across the prairie 10 miles in a second and gone.  at that point i lost sight of object. from the point before it's incredible speed jump it changed direction from n to nw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large disc shaped object hovering above field.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving alone headed south down avenida vista grande in the eldorado at santa fe neighborhood. my wife and mother-in-law were just ahead of me by a minute or so, since we had left a lecture in santa fe, but were driving separately headed to our home. we all saw the same thing and my wife described just what i had seen when i got home and asked her if they had seen anything in the sky.  weather conditions were clear, with starlight and no moon. i first noticed the powerful front beam, but it was shining at a 90 degree angle to my point of view. then i noticed the two blinking red lights far behind, but obviously moving at the exact same speed and connected, but with only blackness in between. at first i thought it was a huge blimp, but there were no other lights of any type or surface features like windows or wings. since there was no immediate traffic on the street except my car, i slowed way down to maybe 10 to 20 miles per hour. it was in front of me, maybe a half mile to a mile, and moved smoothly, slowly from right to left, headed southeast. i felt amazed because of the length of the object. it was many hundreds of feet, or yards long, compared to the lighted houses it was flying above. i continued my route to my home, but kept driving slowly, with my window down watching the two blinking red lights on the tail move away to the southeast into the distance. unfortunately i do not have photos or video since i was driving and it was very dark. however, three of us saw the same thing. my wife and i discussed it immediately, and have since a number of times. we did not discuss it further with her mother who is 93. we didn't want to stress her out or frighten her. thanks
content.summary: Bright single beam on front two blinking red lights on end huge dark slow moving silent

content.detailedDescription: First noticed orange fire like ball moving slowly. helicopter level. then hovered for several seconds. it was quite bright. then it rose and faded to a white light. then it moved rapidly to the north east. speed and brightness reminded me of a satellite. a plane flew near and passed the object. soon after the object increased speed and surpassed the jet plane.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange light. changed color and altitude.  sped off.

content.detailedDescription: In july,1973, my family were visiting las vegas, nevada to go to the casinos. i was 14 years old and not able to go to casinos. i met 2 other guys at the circus circus hotel and we buddied up and ran around the circus circus chasing girls and such. basic teenager stuff. after being out until midnight, i went back to the westward ho hotel we were staying at and found my family members were still out at the casinos. i decided to go sit outside by the pool. las vegas in july, even at night, is quite warm. so as i sat in the poolside chair to wait for either family to return, or some late night pool activity to happen, i was looking at the night sky and noticed these 3 stars to the north. my attention was captured when i saw one of these stars suddenly move sideways at a high rate of speed. then, i saw the same star move back into place and the other 2 stars moved upward and stopped quickly. the next thing i observed was the stars did somewhat of a dance with each other at quick, straight angles and then  they just bolted straight up and were gone. this was the first time i had ever witnessed such a thing. i was amazed as i knew a plane could not do what i had seen. this turned out to be the first of several ufo sightings i have seen since then.
content.summary: Rapid movement of star like lights north of las vegas

content.detailedDescription: I was 5 years old. my mom had just put me to bed for the night. i was laying in my bed, facing the wall when i had felt a sensation of being watched. i rolled over onto my back to see a "being" standing at the foot of my bed just watching me. it was standing there unmoving. it was very tall, about 7 feet. when i saw it, i didn't feel fear. i laid there staring back at it and studying it. to me it was massive but emanated no reason for me to fear it. it felt like forever that we were watching each other. then i heard a "voice" say "roll onto your side and sleep". i followed the orders the voice had said to me. i laid that way for only about 1 minute. i then looked over to where i had seen the creature. it was gone. i got out of my bed to see where it had gone. all my windows were closed and locked. i walked out into the living room where my parents were watching tv. they asked me what i was doing up, i had stated i was thirsty. while my mom walked me back to my room and gave me a drink, i was looking for this creature and found nothing. for many years after this sighting i thought it was the boogeyman. until i was 15 years old and was watching a show about alien encounters and it was showing different aliens that had been seen throughout the world. on this program, i saw, for the first time since my encounter, this alien being that i had seen that night. i was in complete shock and excited that i had finally discovered what i had seen that night when i was 5 years old. i have been searching for this picture since that day i saw it on tv and i can't find it yet again. i really want to find out more about this being i had seen.
content.summary: In my bedroom, an

content.detailedDescription: I was at work at the mobile infirmary.I was outside at 5:30-5:45 pm eating my supper.I was alone and the table was facing north-northeast.As i was eating i looked up and there it was at about 45 degrees hovering.It was oval in shape and translucent with gold reflective color.At first i thought i could see through it.It remained in one position for 5 or so minutes.In the background flying very high were 2 jets with exhaust streams.I keep looking at the object and it very slowly began to move toward the east and disappear.At this point i felt strange in my body.I felt slightly drugged.I immediately got up after it was gone and told a close friend what i had witnessed.I am a professional by vocation and am not on any medication.
content.summary: Oval shaped object that remained stationary for 10 minutes and was colored gold and translucent.Gradually disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my livingroom at 5am just turned on tv got coffee when i noticed that light was comeing through windows on south side of property. not norm. so i opend front door steped out looked up and i   see 2 what i thought suns comeing up. i got up paula and craig they was sleeping. we went back outside and what was going on i dont no but i got pic. of event we see black long idont no got good pic. of it we got what looks to be other planets around sun clouds are moveing like i never seen and things comeing out of this cloud orbs like balls of clouds doing there own thing 
. and aboult 5 black objects in ski. there was yellow red purple pink lights casting all around on trees ground cars houses never seen nothing like that i will be posting pic. i realy like to no what me and 7 other people witnessed 
 please help o and the sun it was not norm that morning and the nest it seems to be off abet not puting off right lighting tell around 8am..All moved off with clouds and lights what im calling light looked like planets..
content.summary: Alote of unone orbs and crafts on 5-16-2015

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I  was at my home when i went outside to smoke a cigarette around 12:15-12:30 an sat down on a chair ,then i looked up at the stars an seen a reflective surface with a red light hovering in one spot for about 2-3minutes it took a right angleur turn in the speed of light an disapeared. after seeing the object i went in side an told my brother what ive seen , i felt confused about what ive seen . never seen anything like it before .
content.summary: I went outside to smoke a cigarette around 12:15-12:30 an looked up at the stars an seen an object with a red light hovering in the sky. the surface of the glowing object looked  reflective, after it sat there for 2-3min it took a right angle turn  an dis

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of my daughter... and i took a picture of the clouds for some reason... and then came home... when i was going through my pictures i notice the sphere at the left side....
content.summary: Loom at the pic i dont understand

content.detailedDescription:
Disk shaped object no more than 150 feet overhead.
i would like to talk over my phone
content.summary: I would like to talk via phone

content.detailedDescription: I was working in the garden with my neighbor. i stopped digging to catch my breath, and looked out across the sky. i focused on what appeared to be a balloon. i looked away and down and thought i better get "j"s' attention quick. i said , "hey , "j", what's that?" he looked up and i pointed it out. he and i watched it keep rising up at about  a 45 degree angle, about 5-10 seconds. then it stopped and turned like looking at a stick standing straight up. then it disappeared. i asked "j", " was that a ufo?" he replied, " i don't know!" we went back to working. it was not a balloon collapsing because i was staring right at it in total amazement as it went flat ( stick like ). the next day i asked "j", " what did you think of the ufo? was it like 30 feet in diameter and maybe a mile or two away?" he answered, " i thought it was much larger and maybe 30 miles away." "j" was a fire department captain and i've been an outdoorsman/handyman/letter carrier among other things. i have been into nature, animals, fishing, hunting, camping, hiking, etc., and never seen anything like that sighting. i'm 64 years old. why report it now 11 years later? i was blessed to see it and the memory has remained fresh. i've been ridiculed for telling my story of how the ufo seemed to try to hide from our vision and that the occupants would have to be "stick people" and why wasn't it on the news, and do you really expect me to believe you were the only ones to see it out of millions of possible witnesses. it crossed my mind to report it back in 2004 but just thought that sightings are seen and reported all the time . i don't own a cell phone but if i had a camera in my pocket it wouldn't have done much good because it happened too quickly. i'm not sure if "j" wants to tell his story. feel free to contact me or come visit me for a first hand, face to face description. the only problem with that is i am a laryngectomee. i lost my vocal cords to disease and surgery 6 months ago. i can speak a limited amount with the implanted voice prosthesis i have to communicate with.  [name redacted/cms/tg]
content.summary: I looked out to see a grey ball rising from right to left , looked down and quickly alerted my friend to it. we both watched it for 5-10 seconds. then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck just sitting at 2 pm. in july of 2013. i saw rectangular object.  it was huge! the plane looked like a bug. it traveled for a few seconds and just left my sight. i was shocked.  i shouted atmyhusband to come and look but shedding hear.  this was not the first info i have seen justthostrecent.And it just vanished from sight. i'm sorry i don't have a photo.
content.summary: I saw object it traveled from right to left in sky and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not the first time i have seen this type of craft (see case # 55806 & case # 61809).Date			19 april 2015
time			20h30 (est.)
geo. coordin.		26° 6' 0" south, 27° 59' 0" east	
conditions		clear, still
location		garden; looking directly above; facing south
shape of object	boomerang – outline only - as per drawing
size			it’s obviously very difficult to ascertain the size, however, the drawing does represent the relative size from my 
			viewing point
direction		i drew in the location of the craft from when i first saw it (sse) – it disappeared behind the tree line in my garden 
			(nnw) 
duration		+/- 5 seconds
as mentioned – conditions were absolutely clear – no haze (which we see often in johannesburg), no wind and no clouds. i was taking pictures of the sky and happened to look up at the very point this object just seemed to “appear” from sse. 
she (i just go with what my “heart” tells me at the time) was incredibly graceful and just seemed to glide overhead in a perfect straight line – no changes in speed or direction. she was beautiful and i felt almost "privileged".My drawing shows a the shape of the outline, but i was unable to create the “cloud-like” effect of the outline, i.E. the outline was less defined and looked more like a wispy cloud – exactly the same as my sighting around the same time last year (april 2014– at around 21h00).
content.summary: Boomerang shaped “craft”; only cloud-like outline observed; seemingly massive and very close; gliding “gracefully” ;

content.detailedDescription: Northern arkansas area... i saw about 1 mile or so out a blackish orb...  it floated in one spit then shot upward.  it flew off into the distance then slowly came to a stop and split into three pieces each a smaller orb.. these orbs hovered momentarily and then immediately and all at once shot upwards at such speed it left behind a streak such as a meteor...  i heard a roaring sound in the distance..But i do live by a large road..
content.summary: Hovered left high speed trail..Changed directions often one ball split into 3

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and were driving to seguin from gonzales in the late eighties.I think it was in the a.M. it was cloudy and about 5-10 miles east of seguin. it was quiet in the car and i noticed a triangular object in the distance just below the thick cloud bank. i watched this object for several minutes, it did not move and we never got any closer to it. then i saw the clouds behind the object light up orange/yellow tilt up and in a blink disappeared above the clouds. it was at this time my mom looked at me and said "did you see that!". we could not believe what we saw.

i have another story if interested.
content.summary: Was witnessed by mother and i while driving. it was still and then tilted up and gone.Lit up clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Es importante señalar que estos objetos los observe al regresar del deportivo los galeana junto con mi hijo aproximadamente a las 11:00 a.M. y observamos entre 17 y 22 de estos objetos; el lapso de tiempo transcurrido hasta llegar a casa es de 15 min. al llegar a casa tomé mis binoculares y video cámara handy cam mod. ccd trv75 y subí a la azotea para ver si lograba obtener imágenes del avistamiento que horas antes habíamos visto, fue cuando minutos después logro ver a lo lejos 7 objetos que se desplazaban al nor-oeste de la cd. de méxico y perdiéndose por el horizonte; al terminar de grabar y 30 segundos más tarde observo que 5 objetos regresan a la zona donde me encontraba y comienzo a grabar. la mejor de las flotillas ovnis que he grabado, se encontraban a una altura aproximada de 4,000 a 5,000 metros en este caso venían de una trayectoria del nor-poniente hacia el sur-oriente rumbo aproximado el aeropuerto o col. moctezuma, como pueden apreciar se tratan de naves tipo combate o algún animal volador desconocido aparentaban un forma como de guerra de las galaxias o galáctica, lamentablemente las naves pasaron por mi zenit y el tope del tripie me impidió seguir grabando, ya que al girar el tripie el sol me deslumbro y las perdí, de todas formas es una evidencia contundente que pocos han tenido, cabe la pena  señalar que parece que el radar del aeropuerto internacional de la ciudad de méxico detecto su presencia ya que durante un buen rato no observe aterrizajes, despegues o paso de aviones que toman trayectoria de rumbo, y posteriormente cuando se fueron se normalizo el trafico aéreo. esta grabación, la procesé en las partes donde comienzan a verse los objetos a baja velocidad de reproducción (.30x), y corregí la imagen para verse lo más natural posible y no perder detalle de los elementos importantes, en los puntos de velocidad normal no tiene cambios de corrección de imagen y se presenta en su grabación normal; es importante señalar que cuando el reloj de la grabación marca 11:22;58 el segundo objeto de izquierda a derecha (el más alto) se observa como si aleteara pero sin extender las alas como lo hacen los pájaros; aquí es donde mus dudas comienzan ¿ serán naves o animal volador desconocido ?  además existe en una parte casi al final del video que aparece un objeto más a gran velocidad, en un momento pensé que se trataba de un pájaro pero tengo dudas al respecto, ya que si fuera un pájaro presentaría un color totalmente obscuro y éste presenta tonalidad blanca en su centro, ustedes juzguen y se respeta su postura.
en caso que se pensara que son pájaros tuve la fortuna de grabar un a parvada un día después del avistamiento ovni y que permite poder comparar el comportamiento de ambas grabaciones descartando por completo que sean pájaros,  llegué a la siguiente conclusión:
1.- la flotilla tenían una altura aproximada de 4,000 a 5,000 mtrs.
2.- en la grabación se logran ver sus rasgos, presentan una ligera inclinación hacia abajo ya que se el frente y no se les observa la parte baja de los objetos estos se encontraban cerca del zenit, se observan planeando con las alas quebradas en forma de triángulo.
3.- por la altura que presentaban cálculo un diámetro entre 20 a 30 mtrs. ya que de lo contrario no podrían verse sus rasgos.
4.- la parvada vuela en círculos y avanzan, volaba a una altura aproximada de 1,000 a 1,500 mtrs., su vuelo planeado es con las alas extendidas y por momentos aletean, su observación es siempre por la parte de abajo, a pesar de estar más bajo su vuelo, apenas logran verse sus rasgos como son cuello y alas. se calcula un diametro entre 1.00 a 2.50 mts.
5.- observación de vuelo, un pájaro no puede planear con las alas quebradas de lo contrario se vendría a pique, los objetos en un principio 7 avanzaron en dirección hacia el cerro del chiquihuite y 30 segundos después 5 objetos regresaron, cosa que si fueran aves regularmente no regresan por el punto donde ya habían pasado.
content.summary: Flotilla ovni de 5 objetos con forma de nave de combate o animal volador desconocido.

content.detailedDescription:
While on break from work- smoking. heard strange conversation - noone was around me. looked forward over the creek and saw a large black objects, possibly with like spaces in hit ( it was a bit far off though) kind of hovering over the road and their was a shimmering energy on the are below it. i have seen other things in this are since i moved here they all are like large birdlike forms but more then a couple hundred feet long and not far above the tree line. i was abducted about 4 years ago from a helicopter and i sometime think they are "looking" for me but they dont get that close. they do make me jittery for a while afterwards. if you want to speak with me about it please call me or we can chat on [website name moved to fi section/cms/tg] under my real name [name redacted/cms/tg]. 

there are quite of a few of them in this county if you wanted to come investigate :)
have a blessed day...
content.summary: Saw large black objects looked like it  was

content.detailedDescription: Going toward to to get something to eat. my friend spotted the lights over the field next to us. it was stationary about 400 feet in the air. we turned down the next road to go see what it was. as we turned, we saw the back of it and there were 2 white lights on the outsides and 2 green lights in between randomly flashing. as we started down the road, it took off toward the east. by time we had traveled half a mile, the object was at the horizon.
content.summary: It's was hovering then took off to the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work, walking to my car at approx 5:30 am. i looked up and i was these craft that were flying i a circular pattern. they were above plane height (my best guess). they never broke formation, and they were equal distance apart. the all looked like white balls. the sky's were crystal clear.

thought it was military craft, but with only being a white light ball. i have no clue.  i stop watching the objects after 10 min.

i attached sketches to attempt to show  what i saw.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Camping. helicopters with men in wight covetous the we're realy shocked we were there and saw them the look on there faces espeshaly one looked right in my ey's    noticed wen it got dark after helicopters went back in. lights were flying around a mountan in the dark at first thout they were planes but they would stop then chang directions. thout then helicopters no noice and to dark no big lights. there was a lightning storm that stayed over that one mountan all night and they kept coming down out of nowhere  they were flying all over the north. mars was so bright that day and night a sati light came over us at about 1pm so low it was glowing red and going realy slow then the helicopters then the lights.  then the orbs they realt freaked us out one was following use and it was like looking into simone's eyeball it was watching use we were freezing it would move along with us about 50 feet away so weried it was intel agent  at first it was fun as the orbs came it got bad the next day i will not talk about on here and bad for quite a wile after they new we saw what we shouldn't have it got light out.  may have a video have bin to freaked to watch it  changed my life forever ! i'm still not sure i should be righting this down hopefully nothing happens to me.  i will copy this and give it to a few freinds just invade for my safety your welcome to contact me i will explain with daits and times to prove some stuff you can check out  first time i've discust this sins it happens we made a pact to never discus it !!   this was a big cover up by using the filming of a movie they could move all there equipment and explain y 4 choppers were flying for 4 moths and blocked off a huge forest service area blocked gravel roads in to area. any way if your interested contact me. i'm leary but should let this out. thanks colin :))

content.detailedDescription:
I recorded a strange noise in the sky in my hometown of harrodsburg, kentucky, around 2am, april 5, 2015 and one strange light! i didn't notice the light until after watching it. i kept my camera recording on the car lot across the road for the most part, to have some light in the video. after reviewing the video, i noticed a light bouncing around, then i zoom up to the moon and back to the car lot business, then the light reappears in the same area, but lower and bouncing more. the sound is what was really strange! the sound was louder than the recorded sound. i probably had my volume turned down, but it was really loud!

anyway, i posted the video on my youtube channel and many people from nearby towns said they heard the sound, too, but at different times. another person emailed me directly. and then a person said (as you can see in the comments) that i should report this to mufon. most people didn't even notice the bouncing light, although i mentioned it in my initial comments about the video.

i have the recording on my phone, on my pc and on my youtube channel. i didn't do any editing at all. if i had noticed the light when i was recording, i would've recorded longer!

look, i'm just a regular working person and my youtube channel is all about books, because i read a lot and write books, too (using a pen name).

i don't want the cia or nasa coming to take my phone or laptop, weird people calling me or aliens visiting me or anyone calling me crazy. i'm just reporting this because a youtube commenter said i should. until that, i'd never heard of mufon, sorry.

video link:  [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: I was recording a strange sound in the sky, later viewing i noticed the light

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My family and i had just pulled into our parking lot between 10:30 and 11 p.M. as we were sitting in the vehicle, i heard a sound like an aircraft passing by. i got out of the vehicle, looked up to the sky and seen a triangular shaped ufo. i am a huge believer in ufo's and extraterrestrials, so as soon as i seen it, i got very excited and told me boyfriend to hurry and look at it too. upon seeing it, i immediately thought that it was an alien space ship. it was amazing! since it was night time, i couldn't see the craft itself, so it must have been black. i seen round, white lights on the corners of the craft, that is how i could tell what the shape was. there was one light on each corner, so three altogether. there was also a shape in the middle of the craft that was red or orange in color and from what i could tell, it looked like it was round with a straight line coming from it. it moved like an ordinary aircraft, moving average speed in a straight line as it traveled. it moved from south to north and i couldn't see it anymore because it was out of view. i must say, i was like a kid in a candy store. haha
content.summary: Triangular ufo above eastern kentucky on 5/19/2015

content.detailedDescription:
The initial sighting occurred on the first or second saturday in june, 2011 at about 3 - 4 pm.  the weather was sunny with some clouds.  we were relaxing outside on our deck watching hawks soaring on thermals through binoculars.  i took notice of what i thought was a gliding hawk and picked up the binoculars for a closer look.  it was clearly a small,  disc shaped object with a slight but distinctive “wobble” with no other distinguishing features.  the color was a flat light grey very similar to a military aircraft paint.  the location was to our south no more than 2 miles from our home and heading east in a straight line.  comparing the size, speed, altitude and location to the small aircraft that fly in and out of sussex airport,  my best guesses would be a diameter around 20 feet, 6-7 feet tall, speed around 200 mph, altitude about 3,000 feet and above the vicinity of route 284 between sussex borough and unionville, ny.  i watched it for about 30 seconds until it was lost from view.  at the time, i thought i was watching a military drone due to it's  color.  about 2-4 days later, i caught another glimpse of the same object from our backyard deck.  it flew directly overhead heading north, northeast.  i only saw it for about 10 seconds between trees, but it was lower than the first sighting (about 2,000 feet) and the “wobble” appeared more like a conventional aircraft's dutch roll.  we could call it a wobble with a wiggle!  there was no noise, markings, lights or vapor trail.  that was the last daytime sighting.  we did, however, see an odd light flying in the night sky twice that summer.  it flew in paths similar to the second sighting and once flew in a curved path.  it’s difficult to judge the height, but it was low - no more than 3,000 feet and comparing it to a small aircraft, flew at twice their speed or 200 - 250 mph.  it was a large, round, bright, solitary light that didn’t appear to throw a beam.  no sound, no navigation or other blinking lights.  the durations were 25 to 30 seconds as sight was lost due to trees and the times were between 9 and 10pm.  as before, i thought that there was some sort of drone testing taking place overhead. 

one final mention.  the airspace above wantage open for aerobatics, balloons, paragliding, skydiving - just about anything.  a drone test wouldn’t surprise me.
content.summary: Small 20 ft diameter grey disk traveling in a straight line with a wobble west to east
